title: Diagnosing Organizational Learning Barriers: A Psychoanalytic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational organizational learning theories and basic psychological concepts
context.additional_context: Online non-real-time course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focuses on cultivating the ability to diagnose and resolve organizational learning barriers for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze behavioral obstacles in organizational learning processes using a psychoanalytic theory-based diagnostic framework
Learners can diagnose learning obstacles by identifying narcissistic traits and symptoms of arrogant organizational dysfunction
Learners can develop actionable behavioral strategies to improve organizational learning based on diagnostic results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
